entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3.
